original_title: The Sadly Neglected Talent of the Banks
overview: Bessie Banks is an American soul singer, best known for her original 1964 recording of "Go Now," successfully covered in the same year by UK band the Moody Blues. Bessie Toni Banks was married to the bandleader/musician Larry Banks. Bessie's son Kevin Banks Sr. is a singer/musican...
title: The Sadly Neglected Talent of the Banks
